item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 29, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Too much efficiency makes everything worse (2022) (264 points | 111 comments)
2. How Discord stores trillions of messages (2023) (211 points | 95 comments)
3. SpaceX launches mission for 2 NASA astronauts who are stuck on the ISS (217 points | 203 comments)
4. NASA is selling a brand-new Moon rover: Never used, one previous owner (10 points | 4 comments)
5. Notes on the Crystal Language (82 points | 25 comments)
6. Ask HN: How have you integrated LLMs in your development workflow? (22 points | 23 comments)
7. Cores That Don't Count [pdf] (60 points | 7 comments)
8. Show HN: htmgo - build simple and scalable systems with golang + htmx (49 points | 15 comments)
9. How can a jigsaw have two distinct solutions? [video] (24 points | 3 comments)
10. Measuring Developers' Jobs-to-be-done (27 points | 2 comments)
11. Class 'Inequity' Fuels Air Rage (6 points | discuss)
12. My Experience Getting Licensed in Ham Radio (2020) (17 points | 4 comments)
13. Solving climate change by abusing thermodynamic scaling laws (21 points | 9 comments)
14. So you want to make pixel art for an Apple II (11 points | 1 comment)
15. Illusions of Competence in Monitoring One's Knowledge During Study [pdf] (13 points | 1 comment)
16. Show HN: Iceoryx2 – Fast IPC Library for Rust, C++, and C (64 points | 14 comments)
17. The perils of transition to 64-bit time_t (224 points | 169 comments)
18. Reverse-engineering a three-axis attitude indicator from the F-4 fighter plane (162 points | 53 comments)
19. The Little Typer (2018) (150 points | 28 comments)
20. The Design of Text Editors (67 points | 25 comments)
21. IBM PC 5150 Model Numbers (22 points | 1 comment)
22. Theattyr: A terminal theater for playing VT100 art and animations (29 points | 2 comments)
23. If AI seems smarter, it's thanks to smarter human trainers (148 points | 116 comments)
24. Cat memes went viral 100 years ago (111 points | 28 comments)
25. Amusing Ourselves to Death (2014) (440 points | 282 comments)
26. Will plants grow on the moon? (68 points | 80 comments)
27. SunVox: Powerful Modular Synthesizer and DAW (170 points | 42 comments)
28. Autossh – automatically restart SSH sessions and tunnels (148 points | 74 comments)
29. Britain buys semiconductor factory for defence purposes (170 points | 78 comments)
30. FFT-based ocean-wave rendering, implemented in Godot (746 points | 93 comments)
